note:
jewmubu figuring things out. trans, queer, parent of two young kids, former teacher, nebulously tranarchist radical gnome.

I used to have tea with Harry Hay's widow at the three dollar bill cafe.
Current follow policy: follows welcomed; will likely followback. Will block fascists of any variety, racists, misogynists, transphobes and queerphobes, etc.
Profile pic: A gnome dressed in punk gear holding a sign that says "Gnazis f*** off"

Header image: stars over a mosque lit in purple and blue
